name: Roserade
author: Shin Nagasawa
flavor_text: Each of its hands contains different toxins, but both hands can jab with near-fatal power.

abilities.name: Le Parfum
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may search your deck for any card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Squeeze
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
